divs: Sighting DetailsSecond sighting in 4 days. Rumson N.J. location close to Atlantic Highlands sighting. Just a few miles. Driving in a car talking to friend about first sighting, and they appeared again, this time a dark object as well. Should have stopped car but we were in shock.
Summary: Second time in 4 days, Rumson location close to Atlantic Highlands sighting. Driving in a car talking to friend about first sighting, and they appeared again, this time a dark object as well.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rumson
There were no other sightings in Rumson on or around July 3rd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
